Home Businesses All Businesses Businesses in Nice Riviera Businesses List Your Business Villas&Apartments All Villas Villas in Nice Riviera Villas All Apartments Apartments in Nice Riviera Apartments Land List Your Property Advice Advice for Buyers Advice for Sellers List Your Property Glossary of Real Estate Terms Blog Finance Partners Contact SELL NOW! FOR SALE: Wonderful, Must-See F2 Apartment–Cap d’Antibes Watch the Monaco Grand Prix 2011 from a Panoramic view of the track! Watch the Monaco Grand Prix 2011 Qualifying from a Balcony overlooking the Start/Finish Line!
With this exclusive package, guests will have the opportunity to view the 28th May Qualifying race from a private terrace situated on the 3rd Floor of Heracles Block B , one of the principal buildings on the Port front.
With this location, you and your guests will be situated directly over the grid&Start/Finish line, and will have superb views of the departure line, Saint Devote corner and hill, tunnel exit, port and pool area, and the pit lane exit. You will be in the middle of the buzz, over the Prince’s lodge, in the heart of the action.
Included in this fantastic price is an open bar for all of your guests!
28th May–200€ per person.
Related Articles:
29th May 2011–Charity Music and Dance Show at Nice’s Theatre de Verdure! Watch the Monaco Grand Prix 2011 from a Prime View of the track–with open Champagne Bar! Watch the Monaco Grand Prix 2011 from a Panoramic view of the track! Electric Cars come to Nice! Like what you see? For more information please e-mail antiqueimmorealestate@hotmail.fr or contact us via our easy online Contact Form. Please don’t forget to include the property reference in your mail.
Whilst we make every effort to ensure all information given is accurate, please note that all the information above is non-contractual.
